fool's day

fool

Posted by sevenseablue on 2016-04-01
- 错误校对

life is like a box of choclate, you never know who will fool you next time.

fool me

愚蠢的人， 来愚弄我吧。

   System.out.println("you are fooled!");

fool you

嘿嘿

  System.out.println("HEIHEI");
